meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Rishi Sangani Liz Reardon Jon Eisenman Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7569.

td.p: Rishi Sangani, a consultant from San Francisco, California
Liz Reardon, a health care consultant from Saint Albans Bay, Vermont
Jon Eisenman, an attorney from Los Angeles, California (whose 4-day cash winnings total $82,301)

tr.td: A REAL NUT JOB
VISUAL ART
CONFUCIUS SAID
A SPARKLE QUIZ
ISLANDS ON THE SCREEN
THAT IS WHAT WE "R"

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Natives along the Amazon basin collect these, AKA para nuts, which are later used in soaps or as food')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Natives along the Amazon basin collect these, AKA para nuts, which are later used in soaps or as food
